cab.content: p-'"-p: From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, 2%th June .1920..I Mussoorie Conference. Following telegram-from Dobbs, No. 82 S., dated z6th June, repeated for information To-day we concluded discussion of action . expected by us from Afghan Government to prevent Afghanistan being made focus of intrigue by Bolsheviks and Indian seditionists directed against. India. Attitude of Afghan delegates was on the whole reasonable."
